item.title: Data analyst sql
item.description: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/span-class-highlight-Data-span-span-class-highlight-Analyst-span-SQL-Quick-Analysis_~021837129463521106207/?referrer_url_path=%2Fnx%2Fsearch%2Fjobs%2F https://learnsql.com/blog/advanced-sql-queries-for-data-analysis/ We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst for a short-term, 3-hour project focused on performing data analysis using SQL. This is a fast-paced assignment, ideal for a candidate with experience in data extraction, manipulation, and analysis through SQL queries. You will be provided with a dataset, and your main objective will be to generate insights by running SQL queries and providing a summary report of your findings. Key Responsibilities:

item.title: Restore SQL from ibd frm files
item.description: Estoy buscando un profesional independiente capacitado que me ayude a convertir archivos de bases de datos MySQL en formatos .ibd y .frm nuevamente al formato .sql. Mi servidor VPS fall√≥ y, aunque pude recuperar las bases de datos en modo de rescate, es necesario convertirlas para poder acceder y utilizarlas correctamente. https://www.upwork.com/jobs/Convert-MySQL-ibd-and-frm-Files-sql-Format_~021836352400960101614/?referrer_url_path=find_work_home
